pos1.name: Past
pos1.description: This card represents your past leading up to this moment.

pos2.name: Present
pos2.description: This card represents you in the present.

pos3.name: Future
pos3.description: This card represents a future encounter.

pos1.name: You in the Present
pos1.description: This card represents you in your present position. That which is the here and now as a culmination of all that has led you to this point.

pos2.name: Expectations
pos2.description: This card represents your present expectations; that which you believe is in your present or future. Your current and future outlook.

pos3.name: The Unexpected
pos3.description: This card represents the unexpected. That which is hidden from you, but may come to pass.

pos4.name: Coming Soon
pos4.description: This card represents your immediate future; those persons, ideas or circumstances which lie just out of reach, but are approaching and will be arriving shortly.

pos5.name: The Future
pos5.description: This card represents your long-term future.

pos1.name: Self [Root]
pos1.description: This card represents you in your present position; the root of the matter.

pos2.name: Feelings
pos2.description: This card represents your feelings, emotions and relationships, as they have a direct bearing on the root of the matter.

pos3.name: Mind/Status
pos3.description: This card represents your mind, thoughts, and concerns of career or social standing, as relates to the root of the matter

pos4.name: Heart
pos4.description: This card represents the central force that plays upon your concerns; the heart of the matter.

pos5.name: Surfacing
pos5.description: This card represents that which is surfacing and soon to be come known; your near-future.

pos6.name: Desires
pos6.description: This card represnts your desires and wants/needs.

pos7.name: Outcome
pos7.description: This card represents the final outcome; the top of the matter.
